chqbook - AM/Executive/Sr. Executive IT & Systems Admin

Location - Gurugram, Work Type: Full Time

It July 01, 2022

JOB DESCRIPTION :

implementation and maintenance of our company’s computing needs.

JOB TITLE:

AM/Executive/Sr. Executive IT & Systems Admin

JOBTYPE:

Full Time

LOCATION:

Gurugram

SUPERVISOR/MANAGER:

IT Manager

MAINDUTIES/RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Installing and configuring computer hardware, software, systems, networks, printers, and scanners
  • Monitoring and maintaining computer systems and networks
  • Responding in a timely manner to service issues and requests
  • Providing technical support across the company (this may be in person or over the phone)
  • Setting up accounts for new users
  • Repairing and replacing equipment as necessary
  • Testing new technology

Qualifications:

Diploma or Certificate in IT Field or relevant experience

  • Computer Science
  • Computing
  • Engineering

Experience:

3-5 years previous experience in a similar role/industry

SKILLS & EXPERIENCE:

  • Intermediate to advanced Microsoft Office skills with Good communication
  • Organized and able to meet deadlines
  • Intermediate to maintain IT infrastructure on LAN/WAN
  • A technical, logical thought process
  • An ability to stick to strict deadlines
  • An ability to prioritise and delegate
  • A keen eye for detail

PERFORMANCE GOALS:

  • Complete administration tasks on time
  • Deal with User clients, and other employees professionally at all times
  • Ensure Uptime of Server room with all network devices and ISP’s
